summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsGive BackFormulated with 100% pure Centella Asiatica Extract, the Centella Asiatica Toner from Mixsoon soothes and repairs irritated skin while boosting moisture levels and promoting collagen synthesis for a firmer, more supple complexion.
details: DetailsBenefitsIdeal for inflamed, acne-prone, or damaged skin, it also helps brighten dull, uneven skin tonesThe lightweight, watery formula absorbs quickly, making it perfect as a wipe-off toner to refine skin textureKey IngredientsCentella Asiatica - Promotes collagen production, which helps to heal wounds and scarsFormulated WithoutArtificial FragrancesAlcoholItem 2643847How To UseAfter cleansing, apply a few drops to the entire face with your hands or using a cotton pad. Pat in until fully absorbed.IngredientsWater, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Centella Asiatica Extract.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: After cleansing, apply a few drops to the entire face with your hands or using a cotton pad. Pat in until fully absorbed.
